mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_service (cs_code, m_code, title, content, phone, email, service_type, name) VALUES (#{cs_code}||#{m_code}, #{m_code}, #{title}, #{content}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{service_type}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(rownum) FROM customer_service WHERE m_code = #{id} AND rownum > 0

SELECT service_type, title, cs_code FROM (SELECT rownum rn, service_type, title, cs_code FROM customer_service WHERE m_code = #{m_code} ORDER BY SUBSTR(cs_code,4,11) desc) WHERE rn >= #{pageStart} AND rn <= (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})
SELECT * FROM customer_service WHERE title = #{title} AND m_code = #{m_code} AND rownum = 1 ORDER BY replace(replace(replace(substr(cs_code,5,17),'-',''),':',''),' ','') ASC
